name: Air Jordan 1 Retro High OG 'Chicago Lost & Found
description: The Air Jordan 1 Retro High OG ‘Chicago Lost & Found’ brings back the iconic silhouette that started it all.

name: Air Jordan 4 Retro 'Military Blue' 2024
description: The 2024 edition of the Air Jordan 4 Retro ‘Military Blue’ also known as 'Industrial Blue' brings back a coveted OG colorway of the legacy silhouette.

name: Air Jordan 3 Retro 'White Cement Reimagined
description: The Air Jordan 3 Retro 'White Cement Reimagined' brings back one of the original colorways, celebrating the 35th anniversary of the AJ3.

name: Air Jordan 11 Retro 'Space Jam' 2016
description: The Air Jordan 11 Retro ‘Space Jam’ 2016 commemorates the 20th anniversary of the movie Space Jam.

name: Air Jordan 6 Retro 'UNC Home'
description: The Air Jordan 6 Retro ‘UNC Home’ features a familiar color combination that pays homage to MJ’s alma mater.

name: Off-White x Air Jordan 5 Retro SP 'Muslin'
description: The Off-White x Air Jordan 5 SP 'Muslin' delivers Virgil Abloh’s stylized take on the retro silhouette.

name: Air Jordan 2 Retro 'Lucky Green'
description: The Air Jordan 2 Retro ‘Lucky Green’ updates Michael Jordan’s sophomore signature shoe with a verdant pop of color.

name: Air Jordan 7 Retro 'Bordeaux' 2015
description: Of the five original colorways released in 1992, the Air Jordan 7 ‘Bordeaux’ is considered the most distinctive.

name: Air Jordan 8 Retro 'Aqua' 2015
description: The Jordan 8 ‘Aqua’ was one of three OG colorways released in 1993. The sneaker made its first and only on-court appearance at the 1993 All-Star game where Jordan dropped 30 points

name: Air Jordan 9 Retro 'Olive' 2012
description: This is the 2012 reissue of the Air Jordan 9 ‘Olive,’ an OG colorway that initially released in 1994.

name: Air Jordan 12 Retro 'University Gold'
description: The Air Jordan 12 Retro ‘University Gold’ features a simple two-tone color scheme.

name: Air Jordan 13 Retro 'Flint' 2020
description: Released in May 2020, the Air Jordan 13 Retro 'Flint' 2020 brings back an OG colorway in Flint Grey and French Blue.
